name: MatchMerchant
description:
A little color matching game for lowrezjam2016.

Match 4 to brew the potion your customer demands.
Manage your resources wisely to fullfill all wishes but don't let them fill
the board. Bombs can help you in hairy situations.

Tools:
Photoshop
Construct2
LSDJ/GameBoy
